verbs.description: [V: indicted] prigozhin ordered beatings killing a security aide to yevgeny prigozhin a russian businessman who has been indicted by american investigators for allegedly trying to interfere with the 2016 u s election says the mogul has been involved valery amelchenko reporter u s bashar assad moscow valery alemchenko president xi jinping vladimir putin prigozhin president russian soviet federative socialist republic elena khusyaynova xi jinping syrian government novaya gazeta russia oleg simonov syria yevgeny prigozhin denis korotkov
